|rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 1300 |nqam2 = 600 |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "RP3000W-D61(RoHS)/B REV:0.3(0.4)" is silkscreened on the board. :OEM: [[Askey]] RP3000W-D61 *Extend existing 802.11ac dual-band Wi-Fi network with speeds up to 1900Mbps. *Quick and secure setup with just a press of the WPS button. *Smart LED signal indicator helps find the location for Wi-Fi performance. *USB 3.0 port for AiCloud support and fast NAS performance. *5 Gigabit Ethernet ports to convert wired network devices to wireless operation. *ASUS ExpressWay uses full-speed device connections to boost performance. *Roaming Assist helps to get a stable connection everywhere in the home or office. ===Specifications=== * Product Segment: AC1900 ultimate AC performance (600+1300 Mbps) * Operating Frequency: 2.4/5 GHz, 600Mbps (2.4 GHz) + 1300Mbps (5 GHz) * Data Rate: 802.11n: up to 300Mbps, 802.11ac: up to 867Mbps * Antenna: 3x transmit, 4x receive internal antenna, signal indicator * Interface: 5x GbE (10/100/1000Mbps), 1x USB 3.0 port * Dimensions: 178mm x 106mm x 106mm (L x W x H) * Weight: 870g ==Links of Interest== ===News=== *[http://rog.asus.com/467442016/country/rog-hq/asus-announces-rp-ac68u/ ''ASUS Announces RP-AC68U'' on '''RoG ASUS'''] *[http://forums.hardwarezone.com.sg/internet-bandwidth-networking-clinic-4/%5Bnews%5D-networking-@-ces-2015-a-4930900.html ''CES 2015'' on '''HardwareZone'''] , [http://hardwareswiki.com/wireless_extenders/Asus_Wifi_Extenders__RP_AV68__RP_AC52__R/804523/ On '''HardwaresWiki'''] , [http://asusnwled.blogspot.ru/2015/06/rp-ac68u.html On '''Asusnwled'''] ===Reviews=== *[http://www.foxnetwork.ru/index.php/en/component/content/article/213-asus-rp-ac68u.html ''ASUS RP-AC68U'' on '''FoxNetWork''' ] :CPU: [[Realtek]] RTL8198C @1GHz Dual-Core MIPS1074Kc V2.4 (5x GbE) :Flash: ''ESMT'' F59L1G81LA 128MB (NAND) :RAM: ''ESMT'' M15F2G16128A 256MB (DDR3) :WLAN: [[Realtek]] RTL8194AR (2.4GHz), [[Realtek]] RTL8814AR (5GHz) :OUI: 30:5A:3A, PSU: 19V DC / 1.5A # Realtek SoC
#export RT-RTL8198C := REALTEK=y RTL8198C=y XHCI=y RTK_NAND=y \
  #IPV6SUPP=y HTTPS=y MIPS32=r2 BBEXTRAS=y USBEXTRAS=y EBTABLES=y SAMBA3=y LFP=y 
  PARENTAL2=y ACCEL_PPTPD=y USB="USB" BUILD_NAME="RT-RTL8198C" #DNSMQ=y MODEM=y 
  NVRAM_64K=y ODMPID=y OPTIMIZE_XBOX=y DEBUGFS=y JFFS2LOG=y REPEATER=y DUALWAN=y 
  USER_LOW_RSSI=y AUTODICT=y PROXYSTA=y CFE_NVRAM_CHK=y #DUMP_OOPS_MSG=y JFFS2=y

export RP-AC68U := REALTEK=y RTL8198C=y XHCI=y RTK_NAND=y \
  HTTPS=y MIPS32=r2 BBEXTRAS=y USBEXTRAS=y EBTABLES=y SAMBA3=y MEDIASRV=y
  SMARTSYNCBASE=y PRINTER=y USB="USB" APP="installed" BUILD_NAME="RP-AC68U" 
  RPAC68U=y NVRAM_64K=y TFAT=y NTFS="tuxera" HFS="tuxera" ODMPID=y YAFFS=y 
  PSISTLOG=y REPEATER=y NEW_USER_LOW_RSSI=y AUTODICT=y PROXYSTA=y DEBUGFS=y 
  CONCURRENTREPEATER=y MDNS=y FINDASUS=y TEMPROOTFS=y NATNL_AICLOUD=y WEBDAV=y 
  REDIRECT_DNAME=y DHCP_OVERRIDE=y SSH=y DISABLE_NETWORKMAP=y DEF_REPEATER=y

export RP-AC55 := REALTEK=y RTL8197F=y \
  HTTPS=y EBTABLES=y BUILD_NAME="RP-AC55" NVRAM_64K=y ODMPID=y REPEATER=y 
  NEW_USER_LOW_RSSI=y AUTODICT=y PROXYSTA=y DEBUGFS=y CONCURRENTREPEATER=y 
  MDNS=y FINDASUS=y TEMPROOTFS=y REDIRECT_DNAME=y DHCP_OVERRIDE=y SSH=y 
  DISABLE_NETWORKMAP=y WLCSCAN_RSSI=y BT_CONN=y MUMIMO_5G=y DEF_REPEATER=y

export RP-AC53 := REALTEK=y RTL819X=y \
  HTTPS=y EBTABLES=y BUILD_NAME="RP-AC53" NVRAM_64K=y ODMPID=y REPEATER=y 
  USER_LOW_RSSI=y AUTODICT=y PROXYSTA=y DEBUGFS=y CONCURRENTREPEATER=y 
  MDNS=y FINDASUS=y TEMPROOTFS=y REDIRECT_DNAME=y DHCP_OVERRIDE=y SSH=y 
  DISABLE_NETWORKMAP=y DEF_REPEATER=y
}} ==See also== * [[ASUS RP-AC87]] - ''Wireless-AC2600 Dual Band Repeater'' (2016/09/13) : [[MediaTek]] MT7621A/MT7615E (iPA/eLNA), RAM 128MB, Flash SPI :• [http://www.asus.com/pl/supportonly/RT-AC85U/HelpDesk_Download/ FW/GPL] • EA-AC87 [http://certifications.prod.wi-fi.org/pdf/certificate/public/download?cid=WFA55379 WFA] (06/27/2014) • [http://article.pchome.net/content-1932587.html CT2016] • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RP-AC87/ PPage] * ASUS RP-AC68U - ''Dual Band Wireless-AC1900 Repeater'' • [https://github.com/RMerl/asuswrt-merlin/blob/master/release/src/router/rc/sysdeps/init-broadcom.c GH] • [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RP-AC68U/ PPage] :(RTL8198C/RTL8194AR/RTL8814AR) • [https://fccid.io/MSQ/-RPAC68U MSQ-RPAC68U] (05/29/2015) * [[ASUS RP-AC68U B1]] - ''Dual Band Wireless-AC1900 Repeater'' • [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RP-AC68U/ PPage] :BCM • [https://fccid.io/MSQ/-RP0S01 MSQ-RP0S01] (11/05/2015) • [http://mobile-review.com/articles/2015/computex-asus.shtml CT] ([[ASUS RP-AV68]]* - [http://hardwareswiki.com/wireless_extenders/Asus_Wifi_Extenders__RP_AV68__RP_AC52__R/804523/ HW]) *[[ASUS RP-AC66]] - ''Wireless-AC1750 Dual Band Repeater'' (Wireless-AC1750) :[[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA956x/QCA8033 • [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RP-AC66 PPage]* *[[ASUS RP-AC56]] - ''Wireless-AC1200 Dual Band Repeater/AP/Media bridge'' :• [https://fccid.io/MSQ/-RPAC56 MSQ-RPAC56] (05/29/2015) • [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RP-AC56/ PPage] *[[ASUS RP-AC55]] - ''Wireless-AC1200 Dual-band Repeater'' • [http://www.pc21.fr/fiche/90ig03z1-bm3r00-rp-ac55-ac1200-802-11ac-wlan-dual-band-repeater-in-i1987308.html PPage]* *[[ASUS RP-AC53]] - ''AC750 Dual-Band Wi-Fi Repeater'' • [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RP-AC53/ PPage] *[[ASUS RP-AC52]] - ''AC750 Dual-Band Wi-Fi Repeater/AP'' :• [https://fccid.io/MSQ/-RPAC52 MSQ-RPAC52] (05/29/2015) • [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RPAC52/ PPage] [[Category:English Documentation]]
